description.@en: Consigned to the life of a wanderer, you have seen far-flung places, shook hands with strange people and picked up odd affectations along the road, but as an experienced traveler, you know that road. In that, youâ€™re oftentimes viewed with apprehension or adoration, depending on who you speak with.

effect.@en: When you fail a Folklore or Navigation Test, you may re-roll to generate a better result, but must accept the outcome.
